mapper.select: SELECT m.mt_cd, m.mt_name, mp.placeod_qt, m.unit, mc.ck_dt, mc.ck_chg FROM mt m JOIN mt_placeod mp ON m.mt_cd = mp.mt_cd JOIN mt_ck mc ON mc.mt_placeod_cd = mp.mt_placeod_cd WHERE mp.placeod_st = 5 AND mc.mc_res = '합격' ORDER BY mc.str_comp_dt

SELECT m.mt_cd, m.mt_name, mp.placeod_qt, m.unit, mc.ck_dt, mc.ck_chg FROM mt m JOIN mt_placeod mp ON m.mt_cd = mp.mt_cd JOIN mt_ck mc ON mc.mt_placeod_cd = mp.mt_placeod_cd WHERE mp.placeod_st = 5 AND mc.mc_res = '불합격' ORDER BY mc.str_comp_dt
